text: so Jeff President Obama on Wednesday
gives a speech on the federal deficit
switches gears on Thursday and goes to
Chicago to kick off his presidential
fundraising what's going to be happening
there the fundraising in Chicago is it's
a symbolic beginning of the campaign but
it's important to for this reason in the
early months of President Obama's first
campaign for years ago it really was in
the Democratic that contributors in
Chicago that sustained him he's doing a
big rally at Navy Pier in Chicago trying
to have the image of people coming
together behind him but then more
importantly perhaps for his bottom line
is going to a couple restaurants
throughout the city to meet with some of
the top donors who contributed to his
campaign for years ago the Republicans
are starting to raise money to we saw
not really a lot of activity and then in
the first week of April tim Pawlenty
gets in Mitt Romney now and the second
week has announced his exploratory
committee Republicans have purposely
taken their time getting in but now they
have to because we're in the second
quarter of the year and they need to
show fundraising strength so they have
april may and june to raise money the
reason that's important is because those
fundraising numbers will show other
donors other contributors how serious
they are again drawing a lesson from
four years ago President Obama
then-senator Obama he raised some 30
million dollars in the first quarter of
the year that was the very first time
that people started taking him seriously
so if you're Tim Pawlenty if you're a
Mitt Romney you want to sort of do a
similar thing to raise a lot of money
over these next two three months so
people take you seriously as a strong
candidate the end of June is really kind
of the first primary data as it's been
called in terms of the fundraising do
those candidates who haven't gotten in
yet then faced a disadvantage I really
look for the next couple of weeks for if
you're going to get in and perhaps
others will get in at haley barbour the
governor of Mississippi is also I and
getting in by the end of april perhaps
in mike huckabee perhaps the sarah palin
could wait a little bit longer but via
contributors the donors really are
looking for some activity to play so
that's why they're trying to get in
right now so the end of june is very

in the middle of july that will be the

who's not
